text: ikkuttar bhumiyil sancaricc tannalkku mumpuntayirunnavarute antyam evvidhamayirunnuvenn kant manas'silakkiyittille? avar karutt keantum bhumiyil bakkivecca predhamaya paramparyankeantum ivarekkalere prabalanmarayirunnu. annane avarute terrukurrannal karanam allahu avare pitikuti. allahuvinre siksayilninn avare raksikkan arumuntayirunnilla
